::Scrat::

Whimpering as he was lifted by Aerotaur, Scrat managed to get what 
the bot was saying.

"Y-you arn't going to hurt me?" he repeats, his legs dangling in the 
air.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>       "Argh!  Snap out of it you little furball.  We aren't going 
to hurt 
> you.  Don't you get it.  WE WANT TO BE YOUR FRIEND!"  He reaches 
down to lift 
> Scrat up and hold him.
